page.title: 06BLAGDON SCHOOL DINNER TIME
page.content: At 12.00 noon Monday to Friday at Blagdon School the bell rings for dinner. We all{walk}into the cloak rooms to{wash our hands}and line up.If the dinners are late in arriving we go to the back playground to play until the dinners do arrive.Then one of the dinner ladies calls us to line up. Once we have lined up we walk to the hall. About 40 people have school meals, the rest have packed lunches. The meals are not bad but it isn't as nice as home cooking, because the food is cooked in Weston.Afterwards we take turns to stack chairs and then we go out in the playground to play. We usually play games like{Bulldogs,Toe {Touch,Cock-a-Rooster}or{Red-Rovers.}If it's a rainy day we stay inside to talk and read comics. At 1.15 the bell rings to end our dinner hour.Back to work again!
